Scenario: Search for an item test # rs_features/SearchForAnItemByName.feature:7 Given I am on the home page of the application # SearchForAnItemTestSteps.iAmOnTheHomePageOfTheApplication() When I search for an item by name # SearchForAnItemTestSteps.iSearchForAnItemByName(DataTable) Then I should be able to see the Item price # SearchForAnItemTestSteps.iShouldBeAbleToSeeTheItemPrice(DataTable) @regression Feature: Searching for an item byRS Stock Number using Quick Order search As a customer I want to search for an item using RS Stock Number only So that I can add item to basket
